HEY, I'M GEORGE ALI

A Front End Web Developer growing one step at a time.

ABOUT ME Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills and tools, mostly in terms of programming.

Get to know me

I'm a Frontend Web Developer aiming at building the front-end of Websites and web Applications that will help leads to success of the product. See some of my work at the Project section.

Fueled by love for growth, I'm currently exploring algorithms while improving my skills in CSS, Javascript and React. With Node.js in view as well as other Languages and Frameworks as par the profession demands. My goal is to make a meaningful impact in the Front-end development landscape and take on exciting challenges while growing.
